title: The perfect Keen fansite!!!:
content:
I need help; I need your opinions: what makes a good Keen site? What do you want from a Keen fansite?

We can use this topic to throw around ideas, and I don't think I will be the only one benifiting from this conversation - We have:

[url=http://www.dosclassics.com/keen]Xtraverse[/url]
[url=http://www.najawa.com]Najawa[/url]
[url=http://www.greenftechn.com/brandon/]BP[/url]
[url=http://planetck.spatang.com]Genius314[/url]
[url=http://www.keengrid.net]KeenRush[/url]

And others that I cannot think of.

Here, you can advritise you Keen site, and forums, and brainstorm ideas. I need help, and I don't think it would hurt the other site owners if you gave them helpful critisism, or suggestions... ME 2!!!

Well... what do you want in a Keen Fansite?

The polls are open!!!

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Proud Leader of the "Tough Guys Wear Pink" Society

title: what do you want in a Keen Fansite?
content:
I look for the following in websites:

- Decent layout (doesn't need to be the most excellent thing ever, but I would prefer if it was).

- Original content (A bit difficult for a game with so many websites about it. Things like the Keencyclopedia and KeenRush's links list come to mind, though).

- Spelling and grammar (I find websites in general to look unprofessional when there are simple spelling mistakes and bad grammar. A random mistake happens to most people, but when there's continual mistakes - like they're/ their/ there and your/you're problems - I am forced to frown upon the website, regardless of content)--------------
[url=http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/][img]http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/imgs/links/pccwsml.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: what do you want in a Keen Fansite?
content:

title: Re: what do you want in a Keen Fansite?

content:

KR: Right. This time I'm going to add content! This won't be like my mods where I give up halfway through.

KR: Okay, first, new paragraph. Right... title, lets see... how about 'New Mods'? Yeah.
